attributes.action: draw British state officials attention on democracy issues in Niger Republic
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
After a decade of good democracy experience , Niger Republic has , until recently , been able to enjoy a growing economic and social welfare , consequences of  such a fair political and institutional environment . But the unexpected intention of the current President of Niger  to stay in office over his legal  two terms  ( December 2009)  by means of spoiling the current constitution , has created an unlimited series of political and social tensions for which , we ,  as Niger citizens in UK very attached to democratic values , are very concerned . 
Therefore , for the sake of justice , democracy and development , we would hereby , respectfully request your valuable input in this matter as  a high profile contribution that would certainly help re-establish happiness and hope amongst our communities . 
Yours faithfully,
